entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -18.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16 except minus 12 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16 except minus 12 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 except minus 18 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 24 except minus 18 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14 except minus 7 south of Hare Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14 except minus 7 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
